text:
COMMAND LISTING:

date		display date and time

help		Display builtin commands. (this screen)

hostname	print name of the current host system

uname		Print operating system name

whoami		display effective user id

Hex90 LTS phreakflag tty1

phreakflag login: phreaker
Password:                 
Last login: __LAST_LOGIN__ on tty1

Mail version 16.2.4 02/30/2019  Type 'help' for help.
"/var/mail/phreaker": 1 message 1 new
>N  1 aephid40@wonderville.nyc __MAIL_DATE__ Party invitation

From aephid40@wonderville.nyc
X-Original-To: phreaker@phreakflag.onion
To: phreaker@phreakflag.onion
Subject: Party invitation
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit
Date: __MAIL_DATE__
From: aephid40@wonderville.nyc

Hey,

Been a while. We need to talk.

Hex90 is happening again. Have you been before? It's a queer jam for hackers, this time at the Wonderville arcade.

We've been working on setting up a secure uplink there and...well...we'll talk more later. Not now, not from your system.

There's something I...need to show you. If you make it to the party with your laptop, connect to the Wonderville network and `talk` me up.

Check out the party invite:

https://hexninety.github.io/invitation.txt

I hope you can make it. Stay safe.

-aephid40
placeholder: Enter `q` to return to your shell.

text:
phreaker@phreakflag: grep -ri -A 3 invite /var/mail/phreaker
Check out the party invite:

https://hexninety.github.io/invitation.txt
